text: Michael Lawrence Yarmush (born June 19, 1982) is an American-Canadian actor. He was born in Miami, Florida. His parents are Daniel and Diane Yarmush. He was the original voice of Arthur Read on the PBS Kids animated television series Arthur from 1996 to 2000, when he left the voice cast. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Miami
title: Michael Yarmush
